sentences.en: Balkan: Of or relating to the Balkan Peninsula or the Balkan Mountains.
sentences.cn: 巴尔干半岛的: 巴尔干半岛或巴尔干山脉的或与之相关的.

sentences.en: Boris Balkan : Try the lunch break.
sentences.cn: 鲍里斯巴尔坎: 午饭的时候试试.

sentences.en: Boris Balkan: You must see her again.
sentences.cn: 鲍里斯巴尔坎: 你必须再去见她.

sentences.en: His novels are a rich synthesis of Balkan history and mythology.
sentences.cn: 他的小说融合了大量巴尔干半岛的历史和神话故事。

sentences.en: In the 19 th century, Balkan people used guerrilla fighting against the Ottoman empire.
sentences.cn: 在十九世纪, 巴尔干半岛人用游击战反抗奥斯曼帝国.

sentences.en: Most of its remaining European territory was lost in the Balkan Wars ( 1912 - 13 ).
sentences.cn: 巴尔干战争 ( 1912 ～ 1913 ) 中丧失了在欧洲的大部分领土.

sentences.en: Of or relating to the Balkan States or their inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 巴尔干半岛各国或巴尔干人的或与之相关的.

sentences.en: The Iberian Peninsula, the Italian Peninsula, and the Balkan Peninsula are three large peninsulas in Europe.
sentences.cn: 伊比利亚半岛 、 意大利半岛及巴尔干半岛是欧洲最大的三个半岛.

sentences.en: The resistance ofSutjeska, 809 C 2 - 2311 , Balkan, 9 D 49 - 612, SWD 73295,2109·36 , Posavka 2, PKBL - 16 , NS 2772, KALISKA and Chambord was Controlled by adominant gene and a recessive gene respectively.
sentences.cn: Sutjeska 、 809C_2-2311、Balkan 、 9D49-612、SWD-73295 、 2109·36、Posavka2 、 PKDL -16 、 NS2772 、 KALISKA和钱保德等11个抗源的抗性系由1对显性和1对隐性基因控制.

sentences.en: The work was to be located in the Balkan region unlicensed construction is a hot issue.
sentences.cn: 这个作品本来要在巴尔干地区展出,而违章建筑是巴尔干地区的热点话题.
